attributes.action: Ensure Parliament make it clear that EU referendum vote to Leave is binding.
attributes.additional_details:
Petition being bandied around in various media sources with 2000000 signatories.

Inflammatory comments of certain MPs (David Lammy, for example).
attributes.background: After 52% majority stated desire to leave the EU the campaign for second referendum makes a mockery of the principles of democracy in this country. Government needs to explicitly state that second referendum is not on the agenda to reassure the 17 million citizens who voted to leave the EU.
